title: Circle Animation
desc:
A full stack application where you hit the notes that are moving along the rhythm of the song.

It uses Vue for the frontend, Node and Express for the backend, as well as PostgreSQL for its database.

title: NextAni Database
desc:
A simple anime database created using Next.js.

It fetches data from Anilist.co's API.

title: Video Trimmer
desc:
A script-based video trimmer using FFmpeg, mpv, and Node.js.

Trim one or more segments from a video that you like and merge each one at the end. All you need to do is to save the filename and all the timestamps which you would like to be trimmed inside a text file and let the program handle the rest.
